Class UserDB

java.lang.Object
data.UserDB
public class UserDB extends Object
Data access class for User objects. Handles storage and retrieval of all user types.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UserDB()
    Constructs a new UserDB and loads existing data if available.

  • Method Details

    • saveData

      public void saveData()
      Saves user data to file.

    • addUser

      public boolean addUser(User user)
      Adds a new user to the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to add
      Returns:
      true if the user was added, false if NRIC already exists

    • updateUser

      public boolean updateUser(User user)
      Updates an existing user in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to update
      Returns:
      true if the user was updated, false if NRIC not found

    • getUser

      public User getUser(String nric)
      Gets a user by NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the user to get
      Returns:
      The user, or null if not found

    • getAllUsers

      public List<User> getAllUsers()
      Gets all users in the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all users

    • getUsersByRole

      public List<User> getUsersByRole(UserRole role)
      Gets all users of a specific role.
      Parameters:
      role - The role to filter by
      Returns:
      A list of users with the specified role

    • getAllApplicants

      public List<Applicant> getAllApplicants()
      Gets all applicants.
      Returns:
      A list of all applicants

    • getAllOfficers

      public List<HDBOfficer> getAllOfficers()
      Gets all HDB officers.
      Returns:
      A list of all HDB officers

    • getAllManagers

      public List<HDBManager> getAllManagers()
      Gets all HDB managers.
      Returns:
      A list of all HDB managers

    • authenticate

      public User authenticate(String nric, String password)
      Authenticates a user login.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the user
      password - The password of the user
      Returns:
      The authenticated user, or null if authentication failed

    • hasDefaultPassword

      public boolean hasDefaultPassword(String nric, String password)
      Checks if the current user's password is equal to the default password.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the user
      password - The password of the user
      Returns:
      true if the current user has the default password

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(String nric, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes a user's password.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the user
      oldPassword - The current password
      newPassword - The new password
      Returns:
      true if the password was changed, false otherwise
